archimate:Requirement.name: R9.1 A process is created for promoting interaction in the ESA community
archimate:Requirement.documentation: U4 As Head of Enteprise Security Architecture I want to provide a place where architects can interact to leverage the skills of our architects and break the silos. U6 As Head of Enteprise Security Architecture I want to provide a place where architects can interact to positively motivate ESA amogst the community U18 As ESA community member I want to discuss ESA with colleagues to get new perspectives on solving problems,
